LanguageData.USAC_MechOrder_Rocky.label: M88 "Rocky" order
LanguageData.USAC_MechOrder_Rocky.description: A USAC military contract for one M88 "Rocky" synthetic infantry unit. Use to call in an orbital drop pod delivery of an inactive mech that can be controlled by a mechanitor.
LanguageData.USAC_MechOrder_Paraman.label: M939 "Paraman" order
LanguageData.USAC_MechOrder_Paraman.description: A USAC military contract for one M939 "Paraman" airborne unit. Use to call in an orbital drop pod delivery of an inactive mech that can be controlled by a mechanitor.
LanguageData.USAC_MechOrder_Gonk.label: X-3 "Gonk" order
LanguageData.USAC_MechOrder_Gonk.description: A USAC military contract for one X-3 "Gonk" heavy artillery mech. Use to call in an orbital drop pod delivery of an inactive mech that can be controlled by a mechanitor.
LanguageData.USAC_MechOrder_Cobalt.label: M7 "Cobalt" order
LanguageData.USAC_MechOrder_Cobalt.description: A USAC military contract for one M7 "Cobalt" cargo mech. Use to call in an orbital drop pod delivery of an inactive mech that can be controlled by a mechanitor.
LanguageData.USAC_MechOrder_Omaha.label: M110 "Omaha" order
LanguageData.USAC_MechOrder_Omaha.description: A USAC military contract for one M110 "Omaha" amphibious assault mech. Use to call in an orbital drop pod delivery of an inactive mech that can be controlled by a mechanitor.
